CatDescriptText: Cutline of related article published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, November 10, 1945, pg. 19, reads: "Evangelist R.T Hudson Holds Series of Meetings at Ethnan - A series of highly interesting and informative Sunday night evangelistic services are being held weekly at the Ethnan Temple Seventh Day Adventist Church..."Portion of related article published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, January 19, 1946, pg. 11, reads: "R.T. Hudson Guest Speaker At Ethnan...Come and hear Evangelist R.T. Judson's dissertation Sunday night, Jan. 20.  A series of prophetic lectures are being held, and you are urged to attend."Sign inscribed "Hear these up to the minute Bible lectures by Evangelist R.T. Hudson, Subject E.E. Carson, Return Missionary from South China, Guest Speaker...?, A Big community Sing led by a vested choir, Subject next Sunday, 7:30 PM, Everybody Welcome"  Message board inscribed "Saturday Sabbath School, 9:30 AM, Preaching 11;15 AM, VPNY 4:30 PM, Services Sunday 7 PM, U.R. Welcome, RT Hudson Minister"
TitMainTitle: Women, girls, and boys standing on steps of Ethnan Temple Seventh Day Adventist Church with sign on front inscribed "Evangelistic Lectures Each Sunday Night...," 2703 Centre Avenue, Hill District
